name: aliexpress.solution.schema.product.instance.post
description: Upload product based on json schema instance.QPS(Invoke per second) for this API is limited to 100 for each appkey and 50 for each seller.

requestParams.name: product_instance_request
requestParams.description: Product instance data. Please note: the shipping_template_id should be replaced with your own shipping template id, which could be obtained through  https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=43456&docType=2
